20110105190006.000|20110105190007.000|CC1|JOBS, STRENGTHENS THE MIDDLE

20110105190037.000|20110105190038.000|CC1|BOEHNER AND OUR REPUBLICAN      
20110105190038.000|20110105190041.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES AS WE WISH THEM

20110105190041.000|20110105190043.000|CC1|WE MUST STAND READY TO FIND

20110105190052.000|20110105190054.000|CC1|AS WE TAKE THE OATH OF OFFICE

20110105190057.000|20110105190059.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION, WE MUST BE EVER

20110105190107.000|20110105190111.000|CC1|THE AMERICAN HERITAGE, OUR GREAT

20110105190113.000|20110105190115.000|CC1|THE HONOR OF SERVING IN THAT    
20110105190115.000|20110105190117.000|CC1|TRADITION AS THE SPEAKER OF THE 
20110105190117.000|20110105190121.000|CC1|HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES.

20110105190631.000|20110105190635.000|CC1|I'M HONORED AND HUMBLED TO      
20110105190635.000|20110105190638.000|CC1|REPRESENT A GREAT, HARD-WORKING 
20110105190638.000|20110105190640.000|CC1|COMMUNITY IN CONGRESS, THE      
20110105190640.000|20110105190643.000|CC1|PEOPLE OF OHIO'S 8TH            
20110105190643.000|20110105190644.000|CC1|CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICT CONTINUE

20110105190648.000|20110105190650.000|CC1|WE GATHER HERE TODAY AT A TIME  
20110105190650.000|20110105190654.000|CC1|OF GREAT CHALLENGES.            
20110105190654.000|20110105190655.000|CC1|NEARLY ONE IN 10 OF OUR

20110105190658.000|20110105190700.000|CC1|RISING FOR AMERICAN FAMILIES.   
20110105190700.000|20110105190701.000|CC1|OUR SPENDING HAS CAUGHT UP WITH 
20110105190701.000|20110105190704.000|CC1|US AND OUR DEBT SOON WILL       
20110105190704.000|20110105190706.000|CC1|ECLIPSE THE ENTIRE SIZE OF OUR

20110105190711.000|20110105190712.000|CC1|CONGRESS.                       
20110105190712.000|20110105190715.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE FALL SHORT.    
20110105190715.000|20110105190718.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE KICK THE CAN   
20110105190718.000|20110105190721.000|CC1|DOWN THE ROAD.                  
20110105190721.000|20110105190724.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE VOTED TO END BUSINESS
20110105190724.000|20110105190727.000|CC1|AS USUAL, AND TODAY WE BEGIN TO 
20110105190727.000|20110105190747.000|CC1|CARRY OUR THEIR INSTRUCTIONS.   
20110105190747.000|20110105190747.000|CC1|                                
20110105190747.000|20110105190749.000|CC1|IN THE CATHOLIC FAITH, WE ENTER 
20110105190749.000|20110105190751.000|CC1|INTO A SEASON OF SERVICE BY     
20110105190751.000|20110105190753.000|CC1|HAVING ASHES MARKED ON OUR      
20110105190753.000|20110105190754.000|CC1|HEADS.                          
20110105190754.000|20110105190757.000|CC1|THE ASHES REMIND US THAT LIFE IN
20110105190757.000|20110105190759.000|CC1|ALL OF ITS FORMS IS VERY        
20110105190759.000|20110105190800.000|CC1|FRAGILE.                        
20110105190800.000|20110105190802.000|CC1|OUR TIME ON THIS EARTH,         
20110105190802.000|20110105190803.000|CC1|FLEETING.                       
20110105190803.000|20110105190805.000|CC1|BUT AS THE ASHES ARE DELIVERED, 
20110105190805.000|20110105190807.000|CC1|WE HEAR THOSE HUMBLING WORDS -- 
20110105190807.000|20110105190810.000|CC1|REMEMBER, YOU ARE DUST, AND TO  
20110105190810.000|20110105190812.000|CC1|DUST YOU SHALL RETURN.          
20110105190812.000|20110105190814.000|CC1|THE AMERICAN PEOPLE HAVE HUMBLED
20110105190814.000|20110105190815.000|CC1|US.                             
20110105190815.000|20110105190817.000|CC1|THEY HAVE REFRESHED OUR MEMORIES
20110105190817.000|20110105190819.000|CC1|TO JUST HOW TEMPORARY THE       
20110105190819.000|20110105190821.000|CC1|PRIVILEGE OF SERVING IS.        
20110105190821.000|20110105190823.000|CC1|THEY HAVE REMIND US THAT        
20110105190823.000|20110105190827.000|CC1|EVERYTHING HERE IS ON LOAN FROM 
20110105190827.000|20110105190828.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20110105190828.000|20110105190830.000|CC1|THAT INCLUDES THIS GAVEL, WHICH 
20110105190830.000|20110105190832.000|CC1|I ACCEPT CHEERFULLY AND         
20110105190832.000|20110105190835.000|CC1|GRATEFULLY, KNOWING THAT I AM   
20110105190835.000|20110105190836.000|CC1|BUT ITS CARETAKER.              
20110105190836.000|20110105190839.000|CC1|AFTER ALL, THIS IS THE PEOPLE'S 
20110105190839.000|20110105190851.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105190851.000|20110105190853.000|CC1|THIS IS THEIR CONGRESS.         
20110105190853.000|20110105190856.000|CC1|IT'S ABOUT THEM, NOT ABOUT US.  
20110105190856.000|20110105190858.000|CC1|WHAT THEY WANT IS A GOVERNMENT  
20110105190858.000|20110105190900.000|CC1|THAT'S HONEST, ACCOUNTABLE AND  
20110105190900.000|20110105190902.000|CC1|RESPONSIVE TO THEIR NEEDS, A    
20110105190902.000|20110105190904.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT THAT RESPECTS        
20110105190904.000|20110105190906.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL LIBERTY, HONORS OUR  
20110105190906.000|20110105190910.000|CC1|HERITAGE, AND VOWS BEFORE THE   
20110105190910.000|20110105190911.000|CC1|PUBLIC THAT IT SERVES.          
20110105190911.000|20110105190913.000|CC1|LET'S START WITH A RULES PACKAGE
20110105190913.000|20110105190914.000|CC1|THAT THE HOUSE WILL CONSIDER    
20110105190914.000|20110105190915.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110105190915.000|20110105190917.000|CC1|IF PASSED, IT WILL CHANGE HOW   
20110105190917.000|20110105190919.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION OPERATES WITH  
20110105190919.000|20110105190922.000|CC1|AN EMPHASIS ON REAL             
20110105190922.000|20110105190923.000|CC1|TRANSPARENCY, GREATER           
20110105190923.000|20110105190925.000|CC1|ACCOUNTABILITY AND A RENEWED    
20110105190925.000|20110105190927.000|CC1|FOCUS ON OUR CONSTITUTION.      
20110105190927.000|20110105190929.000|CC1|OUR AIM WILL BE TO GIVE THE     
20110105190929.000|20110105190930.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BACK TO THE AMERICAN 
20110105190930.000|20110105190932.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105190932.000|20110105190934.000|CC1|IN SEEKING THIS GOAL, WE WILL   
20110105190934.000|20110105190936.000|CC1|PART WITH SOME OF THE RITUALS   
20110105190936.000|20110105190938.000|CC1|THAT HAVE COME TO CHARACTERIZE  
20110105190938.000|20110105190940.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION UNDER          
20110105190940.000|20110105190942.000|CC1|MAJORITIES BOTH REPUBLICAN AND  
20110105190942.000|20110105190943.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT ALIKE.                 
20110105190943.000|20110105190946.000|CC1|WE WILL DISPENS WITH THE        
20110105190946.000|20110105190947.000|CC1|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM THAT BIGGER 
20110105190947.000|20110105190950.000|CC1|BILLS ARE ALWAYS BETTER, THAT   
20110105190950.000|20110105190952.000|CC1|FAST LEGISLATING IS GOOD        
20110105190952.000|20110105190954.000|CC1|LEGISLATING, ALLOWING AMENDMENTS
20110105190954.000|20110105190957.000|CC1|AND OPEN DEBATE MAKES THE       
20110105190957.000|20110105190958.000|CC1|LEGISLATIVE PROCESS LESS        
20110105190958.000|20110105191000.000|CC1|EFFICIENT THAN OUR FOREFATHERS  
20110105191000.000|20110105191001.000|CC1|HAD INTENDED.                   
20110105191001.000|20110105191003.000|CC1|THESE MISCONCEPTIONS HAVE BEEN  
20110105191003.000|20110105191005.000|CC1|THE BASIS FOR THE RITUALS OF A  
20110105191005.000|20110105191007.000|CC1|MODERN WASHINGTON.              
20110105191007.000|20110105191009.000|CC1|THEY, IN MY OPINION, HAVE NOT   
20110105191009.000|20110105191012.000|CC1|BEEN SERVED WELL TO THE AMERICAN
20110105191012.000|20110105191014.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105191014.000|20110105191015.000|CC1|MINDFUL OF THE ELECTIONS OF THE 
20110105191015.000|20110105191017.000|CC1|PAST, AS WE OPEN A NEW CHAPTER, 
20110105191017.000|20110105191019.000|CC1|LEGISLATORS AND THE PUBLIC WILL 
20110105191019.000|20110105191020.000|CC1|HAVE THREE DAYS TO READ A BILL  
20110105191020.000|20110105191022.000|CC1|BEFORE IT COMES TO A VOTE.      
20110105191022.000|20110105191024.000|CC1|LEGISLATION WILL BE MORE        
20110105191024.000|20110105191027.000|CC1|FOCUSED, PROPERLY SCREWS NYSED  
20110105191027.000|20110105191029.000|CC1|AND CONSTITUTIONALLY EXAMINED.  
20110105191029.000|20110105191031.000|CC1|COMMITTEES, ONCE BLOATED, WILL  
20110105191031.000|20110105191033.000|CC1|BE SMALLER WITH A RENEWED       
20110105191033.000|20110105191035.000|CC1|MISSION, INCLUDING OVERSIGHT.   
20110105191035.000|20110105191037.000|CC1|OLD RULES THAT HAVE MADE IT EASY
20110105191037.000|20110105191039.000|CC1|TO INCREASE SPENDING WILL BE    
20110105191039.000|20110105191040.000|CC1|REPLACED BY NEW REFORMS THAT    
20110105191040.000|20110105191043.000|CC1|MAKE IT EASIER TO CUT SPENDING  
20110105191043.000|20110105191046.000|CC1|AND WE WILL START BY CUTTING    
20110105191046.000|20110105191105.000|CC1|CONGRESS' OWN BUDGET.           
20110105191105.000|20110105191105.000|CC1|                                
20110105191105.000|20110105191108.000|CC1|BUT ABOVE ALL ELSE, WE WILL     
20110105191108.000|20110105191111.000|CC1|WELCOME THE BATTLE OF IDEAS,    
20110105191111.000|20110105191115.000|CC1|ENCOURAGE IT, ENGAGE IT, OPENLY,
20110105191115.000|20110105191120.000|CC1|HONESTLY AND RESPECTFULLY.      
20110105191120.000|20110105191122.000|CC1|THE HOUSE WORKS BEST WHEN IT IS 
20110105191122.000|20110105191124.000|CC1|ALLOWED TO WORK ITS WILL, AND I 
20110105191124.000|20110105191126.000|CC1|ASK MEMBERS OF THIS BODY TO JOIN
20110105191126.000|20110105191129.000|CC1|ME IN RECOGNIZING THIS COMMON   
20110105191129.000|20110105191130.000|CC1|TRUTH.                          
20110105191130.000|20110105191131.000|CC1|AND TO MY COLLEAGUES IN THE     
20110105191131.000|20110105191133.000|CC1|MAJORITY, MY MESSAGE IS THIS -- 
20110105191133.000|20110105191135.000|CC1|WE WILL HONOR OUR PLEDGE TO     
20110105191135.000|20110105191139.000|CC1|AMERICA BUILT ON A PROCESS OF   
20110105191139.000|20110105191140.000|CC1|LISTENING TO THE AMERICAN       
20110105191140.000|20110105191140.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105191140.000|20110105191142.000|CC1|WE WILL STAND FIRM ON OUR       
20110105191142.000|20110105191144.000|CC1|CONSTITUTIONAL PRINCIPLES THAT  
20110105191144.000|20110105191146.000|CC1|BUILT OUR PARTY AND BUILT THE   
20110105191146.000|20110105191147.000|CC1|GREAT NATION.                   
20110105191147.000|20110105191149.000|CC1|BUT WE WILL DO THESE THINGS,    
20110105191149.000|20110105191151.000|CC1|HOWEVER, IN A MANNER THAT       
20110105191151.000|20110105191153.000|CC1|RESTORES AND RESPECTS THE       
20110105191153.000|20110105191154.000|CC1|TIME-HONORED RIGHT OF THE       
20110105191154.000|20110105191156.000|CC1|MINORITY TO AN HONEST DEBATE, A 
20110105191156.000|20110105191158.000|CC1|FAIR AND OPEN PROCESS.          
20110105191158.000|20110105191201.000|CC1|AND TO MY FRIENDS IN THE        
20110105191201.000|20110105191203.000|CC1|MINORITY, I OFFER A COMMITMENT  
20110105191203.000|20110105191206.000|CC1|-- OPENNESS.                    
20110105191206.000|20110105191207.000|CC1|ONCE A TRADITION OF THIS        
20110105191207.000|20110105191209.000|CC1|INSTITUTION BUT INCREASINGLY    
20110105191209.000|20110105191211.000|CC1|SCARCE IN RECENT DECADES WILL BE
20110105191211.000|20110105191214.000|CC1|THE NEW STANDARD.               
20110105191214.000|20110105191215.000|CC1|THERE WERE NO OPEN RULES IN THE 
20110105191215.000|20110105191217.000|CC1|HOUSE IN THE LAST CONGRESS.     
20110105191217.000|20110105191219.000|CC1|IN THIS ONE, THERE WILL BE MANY.
20110105191219.000|20110105191221.000|CC1|BUT TO RESTORE OPENNESS,        
20110105191221.000|20110105191223.000|CC1|HOWEVER, COME A RESTORED        
20110105191223.000|20110105191225.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY.                 
20110105191225.000|20110105191227.000|CC1|YOU WILL NOT HAVE THE RIGHT TO  
20110105191227.000|20110105191229.000|CC1|WILLFULLY DISRUPT THE           
20110105191229.000|20110105191230.000|CC1|PROCEEDINGS OF THE PEOPLE'S     
20110105191230.000|20110105191232.000|CC1|HOUSE, BUT YOU WILL ALWAYS HAVE 
20110105191232.000|20110105191233.000|CC1|THE RIGHT TO A ROBUST DEBATE IN 
20110105191233.000|20110105191235.000|CC1|AN OPEN PROCESS THAT ALLOWS YOU 
20110105191235.000|20110105191237.000|CC1|TO REPRESENT YOUR CONSTITUENTS, 
20110105191237.000|20110105191240.000|CC1|TO MAKE YOUR CASE, OFFER        
20110105191240.000|20110105191254.000|CC1|ALTERNATIVES AND BE HEARD.      
20110105191254.000|20110105191257.000|CC1|IN TIME, I BELIEVE, THIS        
20110105191257.000|20110105191259.000|CC1|FRAMEWORK WILL ALLOW THE HOUSE  
20110105191259.000|20110105191301.000|CC1|TO BE A PLACE WHERE THE PEOPLE'S
20110105191301.000|20110105191302.000|CC1|WILL IS DONE.                   
20110105191302.000|20110105191305.000|CC1|IT WILL ALSO, I HOPE, REBUILD   
20110105191305.000|20110105191307.000|CC1|TRUST AMONGST US AND THE PEOPLE 
20110105191307.000|20110105191310.000|CC1|WE SERVE AND, IN SO DOING,      
20110105191310.000|20110105191311.000|CC1|PROVIDE A GUIDE POST FOR THOSE  
20110105191311.000|20110105191313.000|CC1|WHO FOLLOW US IN THE SERVICE OF 
20110105191313.000|20110105191314.000|CC1|OUR NATION.                     
20110105191314.000|20110105191317.000|CC1|TO OUR NEW MEMBERS, DEMOCRATS   
20110105191317.000|20110105191320.000|CC1|AND REPUBLICAN ALIKE, AS YOU    
20110105191320.000|20110105191322.000|CC1|TAKE THE OATH TODAY, I KNOW THAT
20110105191322.000|20110105191325.000|CC1|YOU DO SO MINDFUL OF THIS SHARED
20110105191325.000|20110105191329.000|CC1|GOAL, AND KNOW THAT YOUR        
20110105191329.000|20110105191330.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS HAVE PLACED MUCH   
20110105191330.000|20110105191331.000|CC1|TRUST IN YOU.                   
20110105191331.000|20110105191333.000|CC1|AS SPEAKER, I FEEL PART OF MY   
20110105191333.000|20110105191335.000|CC1|JOB IS TO HELP EACH OF YOU DO   
20110105191335.000|20110105191338.000|CC1|YOUR JOB WELL REGARDLESS OF YOUR
20110105191338.000|20110105191339.000|CC1|POLITICAL PARTY.                
20110105191339.000|20110105191341.000|CC1|MY HOPE IS THAT EVERY NEW MEMBER
20110105191341.000|20110105191344.000|CC1|AND, INDEED, EVERY MEMBER WILL  
20110105191344.000|20110105191346.000|CC1|BE COMFORTABLE WITH APPROACHING 
20110105191346.000|20110105191348.000|CC1|ME WITH REGARD TO MATTERS OF THE
20110105191348.000|20110105191348.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105191348.000|20110105191350.000|CC1|WE WILL NOT ALWAYS GET IT RIGHT 
20110105191350.000|20110105191354.000|CC1|AND WE WILL NOT ALWAYS AGREE ON 
20110105191354.000|20110105191355.000|CC1|WHAT IS RIGHT.                  
20110105191355.000|20110105191356.000|CC1|THERE'S A GREAT DEAL OF SCAR    
20110105191356.000|20110105191358.000|CC1|TISSUE THAT'S BEEN BUILT UP ON  
20110105191358.000|20110105191359.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES OF THE AISLE.        
20110105191359.000|20110105191402.000|CC1|WE CAN'T IGNORE THAT, NOR SHOULD
20110105191402.000|20110105191403.000|CC1|WE.                             
20110105191403.000|20110105191404.000|CC1|MY BELIEF HAS ALWAYS BEEN THAT  
20110105191404.000|20110105191407.000|CC1|WE CAN DISAGREE WITHOUT BEING   
20110105191407.000|20110105191408.000|CC1|DISAGREEABLE.                   
20110105191408.000|20110105191409.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY IT'S CRITICAL THAT   
20110105191409.000|20110105191411.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION OPERATE IN A   
20110105191411.000|20110105191413.000|CC1|MANNER THAT PERMITS A FREE      
20110105191413.000|20110105191415.000|CC1|EXCHANGE OF IDEAS AND RESOLVES  
20110105191415.000|20110105191418.000|CC1|OUR HONEST DIFFERENCES THROUGH A
20110105191418.000|20110105191421.000|CC1|FAIR DEBATE AND VOTE.           
20110105191421.000|20110105191423.000|CC1|WE MAY HAVE DIFFERENT, SOMETIMES
20110105191423.000|20110105191426.000|CC1|VERY DIFFERENT IDEAS ABOUT HOW  
20110105191426.000|20110105191430.000|CC1|TO ACHIEVE THE COMMON GOOD.     
20110105191430.000|20110105191433.000|CC1|LET US NOW MOVE FORWARD HUMBLE  
20110105191433.000|20110105191437.000|CC1|IN OUR DEMEANOR, STEADY IN OUR  
20110105191437.000|20110105191439.000|CC1|PRINCIPLES, DEDICATED TO PROVING
20110105191439.000|20110105191440.000|CC1|WORTHY OF THE TRUST AND         
20110105191440.000|20110105191442.000|CC1|CONFIDENCE THAT HAS BEEN PLACED 
20110105191442.000|20110105191443.000|CC1|IN EACH OF US.                  
20110105191443.000|20110105191446.000|CC1|IF WE BRACE OURSELVES TO DO OUR 
20110105191446.000|20110105191450.000|CC1|DUTY AND DO WHAT WE SAY WE'RE   
20110105191450.000|20110105191454.000|CC1|GOING TO DO, I DON'T THINK      
20110105191454.000|20110105191455.000|CC1|THERE'S TOGETHER ANYTHING THAT  
20110105191455.000|20110105191457.000|CC1|WE CAN'T ACCOMPLISH, AGAIN, ON  
20110105191457.000|20110105191501.000|CC1|BEHALF OF THE PEOPLE WE SERVE.  
20110105191501.000|20110105191505.000|CC1|MORE THAN A COUNTRY, AMERICA IS 
20110105191505.000|20110105191506.000|CC1|AN IDEA.                        
20110105191506.000|20110105191511.000|CC1|IT IS OUR JOB TO PASS THE

20110105191513.000|20110105191514.000|CC1|ON US TO THOSE GENERATIONS THAT 
20110105191514.000|20110105191515.000|CC1|FOLLOW US.                      
20110105191515.000|20110105191517.000|CC1|I'M GOING TO WISH ALL OF YOU THE

20110105191521.000|20110105191525.000|CC1|WELCOME TO THE 112TH CONGRESS.  
20110105191525.000|20110105191528.000|CC1|>> AND IT IS DONE.              
20110105191528.000|20110105191530.000|CC1|THE NEW SPEAKER HAS GIVEN HIS   
20110105191530.000|20110105191532.000|CC1|FIRST ADDRESS TO HIS NEW MEMBERS
20110105191532.000|20110105191534.000|CC1|AND HE HAS A DETERMINEDLY       
20110105191534.000|20110105191535.000|CC1|INDEPENDENT GROUP OF PEOPLE TO

20110105191538.000|20110105191539.000|CC1|>> NO QUESTION ABOUT IT.

20110105191546.000|20110105191548.000|CC1|HUMBLENESS, RIGHT FROM THE FIRST
20110105191548.000|20110105191549.000|CC1|WORDS, IT'S STILL JUST ME.      
20110105191549.000|20110105191551.000|CC1|ALSO A HEALING NOTE BECAUSE HE'S
20110105191551.000|20110105191553.000|CC1|TAKING OVER AN INSTITUTION THAT 
20110105191553.000|20110105191554.000|CC1|IS VERY UNPOPULAR IN THE EYES OF
20110105191554.000|20110105191555.000|CC1|THE AMERICAN PEOPLE.            
20110105191555.000|20110105191557.000|CC1|>> AT THE SAME TIME, NANCY      
20110105191557.000|20110105191558.000|CC1|PELOSI, THE NATION'S FIRST      
20110105191558.000|20110105191600.000|CC1|SPEAKER, SEEMED TO LAY DOWN A   
20110105191600.000|20110105191601.000|CC1|FEW MARKERS ABOUT HEALTH CARE IN

20110105191611.000|20110105191614.000|CC1|CLEARLY THE -- NEWT GINGRICH WAS

20110105191621.000|20110105191623.000|CC1|BOLD AGENDA THAT WE ENACT IN 100
20110105191623.000|20110105191624.000|CC1|DAYS.

20110105191629.000|20110105191631.000|CC1|2007, SHE TALKED ABOUT WHAT THEY
20110105191631.000|20110105191633.000|CC1|WOULD DO IN THE FIRST 100 HOURS.
20110105191633.000|20110105191635.000|CC1|THIS WAS A MUCH HUMBLER AGENDA, 
20110105191635.000|20110105191637.000|CC1|A MUCH, IN MANY WAYS, HUMBLER   
20110105191637.000|20110105191638.000|CC1|SPEAKER.                        
20110105191638.000|20110105191640.000|CC1|ALSO, AS YOU NOTICED, AN        
20110105191640.000|20110105191641.000|CC1|EMOTIONAL ONE.                  
20110105191641.000|20110105191642.000|CC1|WE ALL WONDERED WHEN OR IF HE   
20110105191642.000|20110105191643.000|CC1|WOULD CRY.                      
20110105191643.000|20110105191644.000|CC1|DIANE, DID YOU NOTICE THAT THE

20110105191646.000|20110105191647.000|CC1|FLOWING BEFORE HE STEPPED UP TO

20110105191815.000|20110105191817.000|CC1|EXPECTED TO BE GENE SPERLING.

20110105191818.000|20110105191820.000|CC1|BEEN FOCUSED ON, A MAJOR STAFF

20110105191821.000|20110105191822.000|CC1|>> THE PRESIDENT ALSO WANTED TO

20110105191827.000|20110105191828.000|CC1|AGREEMENT.                      
20110105191828.000|20110105191829.000|CC1|THEY HAD A LOT IN THE LAME DUCK.
20110105191829.000|20110105191831.000|CC1|IT'S GOING TO BE TOUGH IN THIS

20110105191832.000|20110105191833.000|CC1|>> AND NO MATTER WHO IS INVOLVED

20110105191846.000|20110105191848.000|CC1|BE SURE TO TUNE IN TO "WORLD

20110105191849.000|20110105191850.000|CC1|I'M GOING TO BE TALKING WITH

20110105191852.000|20110105191853.000|CC1|PARTY MAVERICKS.
